Welcome.title: Welcome !
Welcome.description: Hello, and welcome to the Camera Museum of Vevey. Meet your visiting companion. Let's discover how it works.

Snap.notFoundDesc1: Stand in front of the object
Snap.notFoundDesc3: There seems to be a problem.

step1.title: The floors
step1.desc: Both in the museum and in the application, the exhibitions are organised by floor. When you change floors, simply click on them in the navigation.

step2.title: Show content
step2.desc: By clicking on an object, you can go and see the content related to it, including a short podcast about the object!

step3.title: The "seen" indicator
step3.desc: Here you will see a small "seen" indicator as you visit. This shows you which objects you have already consulted, either with the camera or via the list.

step4.title: Catch'em all!
step4.desc: There, a counter allows you to have an overview of the number of elements "seen". Try to get them all to receive a surprise at the end of your visit !

step5.title: Take a picture
step5.desc: Now that you know everything about the "List" mode, come and discover the "Camera" mode! For that, nothing could be easier, click on the button below. And take a picture !
